title: Harry Potter: Magic Awakened™
subTitle: Role Playing/Action-strategy/Casual
desc:
The magical adventure awaits you. Master the Magic!
Begin your adventure as a new student at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and immerse yourself in an all-new story with new friends.
Your acceptance letter has already been sent by owl. Welcome to Hogwarts!
〓EXPLORE THE WIZARDING WORLD〓
Enjoy unrivalled enchantment in a European fairytale aesthetic. Stroll along Diagon Alley and marvel at all of the magical shops; fly around Hogwarts on your broomstick, or venture deep into the Forbidden Forest to learn the mysteries of the Unicorns and Centaurs... All of your dreams become true here!
〓TAKE ENCHANTING CLASSES〓
Master the Levitation Charm, face a Boggart, peer into a crystal ball to discover your destiny... Team up with classmates to overcome all challenges on your path to becoming a wizarding great!
〓CAST MAGICAL SPELLS〓
"Expelliarmus!" "Stupefy!" Join breathtaking duels at the Duelling Club. Build your deck with powerful magic and echoes of familiar faces. Cast and dodge spells with strategy and tactics. Victory is at your fingertips!
〓ENJOY YOUR WIZARDING LIFE〓
Summon the courage to invite a special someone to dance, or form a house team with your friends... Live your magical life your way in the open wizarding world.
〓RELIVE CLASSIC MOMENTS〓
Bring history to life using the Book With No Name hidden deep within the library's restricted section. Defend the Philosopher's Stone; use the Patronus Charm to save Sirius Black, and battle your way out of the Triwizard Maze like Harry Potter... This time, you write your own adventure.
〓ADVENTURE IN CINEMATIC STORIES〓
Years have passed after the Dark Lord's demise, but something sinister is threatening the peace. What will become of Hogwarts, and who will uncover the truth by combating the dark arts?
